com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp

Interface PDPEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ATTPDPEngine

    public interface PDPEngine
    PEPEngine is the interface that applications use to make policy queries against a XACML 3.0 policy engine.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Response decide(Request pepRequest)
      Evaluates the given Request using this PDPEngine's Policy Sets to determine if the given Request is allowed.
      java.util.Collection<java.net.URI> getProfiles()
      Gets the Collection of URIs that represent the profiles supported by this PDPEngine.
      boolean hasProfile(java.net.URI uriProfile)
      Determines if this PDPEngine supports the given URI profile.

    • Method Detail

      • decide

        Response decide(Request pepRequest)
                throws PDPException
        Evaluates the given Request using this PDPEngine's Policy Sets to determine if the given Request is allowed.
        Parameters:
        pepRequest - the Request to evaluate
        Returns:
        a Response indicating the decision
        Throws:
        PDPException

      • getProfiles

        java.util.Collection<java.net.URI> getProfiles()
        Gets the Collection of URIs that represent the profiles supported by this PDPEngine.
        Returns:
        an Collection over the URIs that represent the profiles supported by this PDPEngine.

      • hasProfile

        boolean hasProfile(java.net.URI uriProfile)
        Determines if this PDPEngine supports the given URI profile.
        Parameters:
        uriProfile - the URI representing the profile feature requested.
        Returns:
        true if the profile is supported, else false
